title: Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News         Rangers having fun!   Sleeping Bear Dunes park rangers celebrated National Park Week in style! Take a look at this video and picture yourself running down the Dune Climb with us!   Â    We Always Knew It! Sleeping Bear Dunes is the Most Beautiful Place in America Good Morning America produced evidence that proved to everyone what most people in northern Michigan already knew-Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore is the most beautiful place in America! The ABC morning news program conducted a poll on their website in August asking people to vote for one of ten places nominated for the honor by their viewers.   Click here for more information.
